column1: Drunk Elephant,Bouncy Brightfacial Brightening Mask with 10% Azelaic Acid + 1% Salicylic Acid,$89.00 ,Size: 1.69 oz / 50 mL,Good for: Redness
column6:
Good for: Dark spots,"

What it is: A leave-on mask that visibly boosts radiance, clarifies uneven tone, fades spots, and reduces redness to reveal a brighter, bouncier, more even-looking complexion.


Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily


Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Pores, and Redness


Formulation: Mask


Highlighted Ingredients:

- Barley-Derived Azelaic Acid 10%: Soothes and visibly brightens skin.

- Salicylic Acid 1% (BHA): Exfoliates, unclogs pores, and improves the appearance of texture and tone.

- Triple-Antioxidant Brightening Complex: Visibly reduces hyperpigmentation by supporting areas of excess melanin production.


Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free and comes in recyclable packaging.


What Else You Need to Know: Add this mask to your morning or evening routine daily for dramatic visible results. It is formulated with a skin-friendly pH of 4.2.


Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant skincare is free of essential oils, silicones, fragrance, PEGs, and irritants.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.


Clinical Results: In a consumer-perception study with 30 people, after 4 weeks:

- 96% agreed skin felt smoother

- 90% agreed the product restored bounce, clarity, and radiance to skin and that skin’s texture steadily improved

- 83% agreed the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and discoloration improved and their complexion looked more even

column6:
AHA/Glycolic Acid,"

What it is: An AHA/BHA at-home peel that resurfaces skin to visibly reveal greater clarity, improved skin texture and tone, and a more youthful-looking appearance.


Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily


Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles, and Pores


Formulation: Lightweight Mask


Highlighted Ingredients:

- 25% AHA Blend (glycolic + (T) tartaric, (L) lactic, (C) citric acids): Exfoliates dead surface skin cells and revs up surface turnover to smooth and brighten the appearance of skin.

- Salicylic Acid (BHA) 2%: Penetrates to exfoliate and unclog inside pores as well as on the surface of the skin, providing greater visible skin clarity while soothing redness.

- Chickpea Flour: Balances and brightens skin‘s appearance while combating visible dullness.


What Else You Need to Know: Created with all skin in mind, Babyfacial‘s 25 percent AHA/2 percent BHA blend gently exfoliates the pore lining and resurfaces by removing dead skin cells. With an ideal pH level of 3.5, glycolic, tartaric, lactic, citric, and salicylic acids work together to ensure higher efficacy without visible redness and sensitization.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.


Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Award Wins:

-Glamour, 2019 Glamour Beauty Award

-Martha Steward Living, 2019 Living Editor's Pick

-Harpers Bazaar, 2019 Anti-Aging Award


Clinical Results:

Drunk Elephant,F-Balm™ Electrolyte Waterfacial Mask,$70.00 ,Size: 1.69 oz/ 50 mL,,"

What it is: A cooling, quenching overnight mask that visibly plumps and restores with an electrolyte cocktail while helping to support the skin’s acid mantle.


Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily


Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity


Formulation: Mask


Highlighted Ingredients:

- Four-Electrolyte Blend: With antioxidant-rich and powerful humectant ingredients (coconut water, sodium PCA, magnesium PCA, and prickly pear extract), electrolytes are vital to helping maintain hydration levels in skin, supporting barrier strength and lipid content, calming redness, and protecting against environmental dehydration.

- Vitamin F: Soothing fatty acids (linolenic and linoleic) play a vital role in maintaining hydration levels and improving skin texture and suppleness while reducing visible irritation and supporting acid-mantle strength.

- Niacinamide: Also known as vitamin B3, niacinamide has a wide range of benefits, most notably its ability to improve visible signs of aging including fine lines, wrinkles, and loss of firmness as well as uneven tone and texture.


Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.


What Else You Need to Know: Barrier-replenishing ingredients niacinamide, sodium PCA, plant squalane, ceramides, omega fatty acids, and antioxidants rehydrate hungover, parched skin, making it soft and supple and improving visible signs of damage and uneven texture and tone. Vitamin F beads deliver extra emollience and soothing hydration.


This mask is free of essential oils, silicones, fragrance, PEGs, and irritants.


Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.


Clinical Results:

In a consumer-perception study with 30 people after 8 weeks:

- 93% agreed skin felt softer

- 90% agreed skin felt smoother, nourished, and more hydrated

- 90% agreed the overall quality of skin improved

If you want to know more…
Fresh Black Tea Firming Overnight Mask is an intensely moisturizing treatment that lifts your nighttime ritual to new heights. This sleeping mask acts like a corset for your complexion, giving you a lifted, firmer look by morning.

A proprietary complex of kombucha (black tea ferment), black tea extract, blackberry leaf extract, and lychee seed extract is proven to inhibit damaging free radicals and helps improve the appearance of skin elasticity. The overnight mask also features belle de nuit extract to soothe and rebalance the skin, peptides to help firm the skin and visibly defy the signs of gravity, and hyaluronic acid to attract and maintain moisture to enhance suppleness.

What else you need to know:
"
column2: Infused with our proprietary black tea complex and soothing belle de nuit, nature’s ‘flower of the night,’ this intensely moisturizing mask is designed to work with your skin’s nightly recovery process to visibly lift and contour the complexion.&quot
column4:
Lev Glazman, Fresh Co-founder

Research results:
In a 28-day consumer test on 32 subjects:
- 94% noticed their skin was more supple and radiant after 2 weeks
- 91% noticed diminished signs of fatigue after 2 weeks
- 97% noticed their skin looked visibly healthier after 1 month
- 94% noticed their skin looked revitalized after 1 month
- 88% noticed improved elasticity and firmness after 1 month

Beauty tips:
- This overnight face mask is like contouring without makeup for any day you need a more lifted look.

column1: - Use Fresh Black Tea Firming Overnight Mask to prep for a big event the next day.
- For extra nourishment, use after your moisturizer as the last step of your nighttime ritual.

- Follow this massage technique to elevate the experience and benefits: start with your neck, massaging the face mask in upward sweeping motions from your collarbone to your jawline and repeat three times. Then, move on to your face, applying upward from your chin to your forehead.

What it is:

column10: packed with Japanese beautyberry, two types of vitamin C, and AHAs from seven fruits&#151
column11:
that unveils softer, glowing skin.

Solutions for:
- Dullness and uneven texture
- Dark spots and uneven skin tone
- Fine lines and wrinkles

If you want to know more…
Reveal remarkably softer, smoother skin with this creamy rinse-off treatment mask. The formula features two types of vitamin C: a water-soluble vitamin C derivative that absorbs quickly for an immediate glow and an oil-soluble vitamin C derivative that remains in skin longer, providing antioxidant protection from UV damage for a brighter, more even-toned appearance over time. The mask is also powered by the Japanese beautyberry, a superfruit rich in antioxidants that was found to stabilize vitamin C, maximizing its effectiveness. A gentle 10 percent AHA complex of seven fruits removes debris and the buildup of dead skin cells to visibly improve skin texture and support the natural production of new skin cells. Tatcha's signature trio of Japanese anti-aging superfoods—
column13:
helps to restore a more youthful appearance.

What else you need to know:
One of the geisha’s most beloved beauty secrets for radiant skin was a face pack—
column14:
an intensive rinse-off treatment made from fresh fruits and botanicals. This time-tested practice inspired the Violet-C Radiance Mask, a modern treatment for smooth, glowing skin. This product is non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, or TEA.

Beauty that gives back: every Tatcha purchase you make supports girls’ education around the world. Tatcha is proud to partner with Room to Read to transform girls’ futures.—

Victoria Tsai, Founder

Without Parabens ","What it is: A cooling, pore-purifying mask that breaks apart stubborn dirt and oil to unclog pores, shrink pores' appearance, and cleanse skin.

Skin Type: Normal, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Pores, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness

Formulation: Cream

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Salicylic Acid and Iris Extract: Exfoliate and remove dead skin cells, helping to loosen blackheads, keep pores clean, and prevent clogging.
- Glycolic Acid, Alpha Hydroxy Acid: Exfoliate and soften the appearance of skin’s texture.
- Mineral Powder: Extracts dirt and absorbs excess oil.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This high-tech mask, powered by an AHA/BHA salicylic and glycolic acid complex, takes a deep dive into pores to break down dirt and oil and exfoliate away dead skin cells to loosen blackheads and whiteheads. Pesky pores are restored back to a happy state for a healthy-looking complexion.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

column1:
What it is:
A unique, coconut-derived sheet mask that boosts the moisture content of skin by up to 200 percent in 15 minutes for a luminous, plump-looking complexion.
Solutions for:
- Dryness
- Dullness and uneven texture
- Loss of firmness and elasticity

If you want to know more…
This biocellulose treatment mask contains an anti-aging serum: a proprietary complex of Okinawa red algae and natural hyaluronic acid that delivers an instantly hydrated, firmed, and lifted appearance. Each mask is distilled from an entire coconut into an ultra-concentrated mask, forming an occlusive layer on the skin and allowing for 53 percent more efficient penetration of its serum than paper masks. The pure and powerful active ingredients are able to quickly saturate the skin, infusing revitalizing moisture and plumping away the appearance of fine lines. Tatcha's signature Hadasei-3—
column2: a trio of anti-aging Japanese superfoods born from nourishing green tea, rice, and algae&#151

column1:
What else you need to know:
The remarkable efficacy of the geisha’s mask treatments can be traced back centuries to an ancient beauty text. Etched onto its pages is the depiction of tea kettles with swatches of kimono silk set atop lids to capture the essence of botanicals distilled by steam overnight. Rich in vital fresh extracts, the saturated cloth would then be applied to the geisha’s face. The Luminous Deep Hydration Lifting Mask brings this timeless practice to life with an advanced sheet mask.
This pure formula is non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, cruelty-free, and formulated without synthetic fragrances, mineral oil, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, or TEA.
Beauty that gives back: every Tatcha purchase you make supports girls’ education around the world. Tatcha is proud to partner with Room to Read to transform girls’ futures.—

Research results:
In a clinical study:
- 100% of women experienced a 197% increase in hydration after 15 minutes
In a consumer use study after just 1 use:
- 100% of women agreed that their skin felt smoother
- 100% of women agreed that their skin felt firmer

column5:
Without Sulfates SLS & SLES,"What it is: A skin-transforming clay mud mask that intensely exfoliates for softer, smoother, and more glowing skin in as little as ten minutes.

- TEAOXI®
column6:
Green Tea Leaf: Infuses mud with antioxidants from whole tea leaves.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and mineral oil. This product is also vegan and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Reboot your glow with the mask that started a masking revolution. YOUTHMUD®
column7:
exfoliates with volcanic pumice rock to help smooth the appearance of fine lines and visibly soften skin’s texture, while natural clays lift impurities without disturbing skin’s essential oils. Antioxidants from green tea leaves brighten and smooth for visibly firmer, more glowing, youthful-looking skin instantly.

Founder Blurb: Co-founders Shannon and Glenn Dellimore were enjoying a casual evening with friends in the Hollywood Hills when an actor friend asked if anyone knew of a product that made skin instantly camera-ready. The verdict was unanimous: other than time-consuming facials that took weeks (even months), nothing gave instant glowing results. With willing celebrities as test subjects, they set out to create a solution. After researching, they found a small, family-owned lab to make the formula, filled it in plain-white sample jars at home and hand-delivered it. Wowed by the results, word spread fast in Hollywood. Top entertainment executives, A-list actors, musicians, and celebrity makeup artists all called requesting the "
column8: no-name magic mud.&quot

column10: and YOUTHMUD&reg

were born.

Developed to deeply hydrate, cool, and visibly plump the skin, the Hyaluronic Marine Hydrating Modeling Mask is a professional-grade product straight from Dr. Gross' New York City practice. The two-step gel and loose powder formula improves the appearance of fine lines and pores, revives dull, dry, and dehydrated skin, and smooths the appearance of uneven skin tone and texture for skin that looks firm, supple, and dewy. The system is designed to create an occlusive barrier, loaded with humectants to seal in hydration, while an algae and calcium complex draws heat to cool and calm the skin. Medical grade marine algae, harvested from arctic Norwegian seas, and deeply hydrating hyaluronic acid work to instantly create the appearance of plumper skin and seal in moisture for lasting hydration.
